Things I like to photograph

Animals are my most photographed subject, but I’ll commonly shoot people and places, or whatever interesting scene I come across. Take a look through my photography portfolio by choosing an album below, or check out my Flickr photostream.

Exposure Stories

I love capturing moments and scenes that can build a narrative, so naturally I’m a huge fan of photography platform Exposure. Whether it’s a trip to a local farm or a weekend in a beautiful city, I enjoy creating visual stories with my photos.
